title: **Cube of Force Faces**
explicit_references: Magic Items > Cube of Force Faces
rule_text:
#### **Cube of Force Faces** | Face | Charges | Effect | |------|---------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 1 | 1 | Gases, wind, and fog can't pass through
the barrier. | | 2 | 2 | Nonliving matter can't pass through the
barrier. Walls, floors, and ceilings can pass
through at your discretion. | | 3 | 3 | Living matter can't pass through the
barrier. | | 4 | 4 | Spell effects can't pass through the barrier. | | 5 | 5 | Nothing can pass through the barrier.
Walls, floors, and ceilings can pass through
at your discretion. | | 6 | 0 | The barrier deactivates. | The cube loses charges when the barrier is targeted by certain spells or comes into contact with certain spell or magic item effects, as shown in the table below. | Spell or Item | Charges Lost | |------------------|--------------| | Disintegrate | 1d12 | | Horn of blasting | 1d10 | | Passwall | 1d6 | | Prismatic spray | 1d20 | | Wall of fire | 1d4 |
